alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 29 at 7:20PM AKST until December 30 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall will occur at higher elevations along the Klondike Highway Friday evening with rates diminishing overnight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
